attributes.additional_details:
Covid-19 numbers are rising exponentially, hospitals are seeing an influx of cases. NHS staff are running on fumes already and we feel that we should have had a circuit breaker lockdown as soon as the R number got dangerously high again. We know viral infections get worse in winter (see cold and flu) and we need a lockdown ASAP, if we want the NHS to have any chance of coping, with the added burden of Covid-19.
The longer we wait, the worse it gets.
If we do this now, we save lives.
attributes.background: Initiate a national lockdown ASAP even if only for 2 weeks. We understand there are economic concerns that need to be dealt with but this can be done through virtual meetings AFTER we take action to save lives.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new national lockdown, from 5 November to 2 December: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/new-national-restrictions-from-5-november

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Enforce an extreme two-week lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553156

Start a second lockdown including closing schools to prevent spread of COVID: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550736
